content: these mothman-themed socks feature miniature colorwork motifs of the beloved cryptid making for a uniquely cozy and spooky accessory the socks are knitted top down from cuff to toe beginning with a twisted rib cuff stranded colorwork in the round heel flap gusset and duplicate stitching to add the final details the pattern is suitable for low-intermediate level knitters **materials** *needles * * 2 5 mm us 1 5 circular needles note this pattern was designed to be knitted in the round on 80 cm circular needles using the magic loop technique and instructions are written accordingly but feel free to adjust for a different length cord or dpns if that is your preference *yarn * this pattern was designed using rico design essentials merino dk in silver grey black and red and requires the following approximate quantities * gray 52 g / 125 m / 137 yds 62 g / 149 m / 163 yds 73 g / 176 m / 192 yds * black 43 g / 104 m / 113 yds 51 g / 123 m / 134 yds 60 g / 144 m / 158 yds * red approximately 2 m / 2 ¼ yds for duplicate stitch the featured yarn is a very lightweight dk yarn and the pattern may also be worked with a sport yarn that can achieve the correct gauge
